CHAT.comment: there was a gap in the video tape from 11:18-11:24.

u.a: Steven is placing a plastic bag full of bagels inside his toy car .
points to front seat , still holding bagels
hands the bag of bagels to FAT
Steven places bagels in front seat of toy car .
Andrea has just re-entered the scene .
Rolf places bagels in front seat of toy car .
Andrea , who has left the scene , re-enters with bowls of soup .
the family settles down to eat at a low table .
Andrea discovers the camera is not aimed properly and gets up to fix it .
Andrea , who has not yet cut the bagel , rises again to adjust the camera .
Steven is distressed that Andrea has gotten up to adjust the camera
shows Steven cut part of bagel .
Steven takes a bite and coughs .
Rolf gets up , goes to kitchen and returns
Andrea is rummaging through a pile of books
Andrea begins reading with great animation , placing very high pitch on stressed syllables in dinosaur , birthday , look , etc .
Andrea resumes normal intonation when not reading .
Andrea is reading aloud , again with exaggerated intonation
Rolf goes in and out of earshot , caring for Lara , who has begun to fuss . Lara sneezes .
Andrea slows her speech and talks more quietly when talking to or about Lara .
Andrea resumes reading to Steven , but retains the intonation and pitch she has been using with Lara .
Steven has been looking at book while Andrea and Rolf discuss Lara .
Lara's crying near camera makes transcription difficult .
Rolf is talking to Lara and his voice obscures some of what Andrea is saying . Lara is still crying .
